product_description: A corky layer kicks up the appeal of a '90s-throwback platform sandal styled with a modest wedge and comfy, contoured footbed.
product_details_and_care:
A corky layer kicks up the appeal of a '90s-throwback platform sandal styled with a modest wedge and comfy, contoured footbed.
2 1/4" heel; 1 1/4" platform (size 8.5)
3" strap height
Adjustable strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #6053034
